item.title: ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Has ‘Very Good Chance’ for Season 3 Despite Charlie Cox Calling Season 2 the ‘Final’ One at Fan Event
item.description: Vincent D’Onofrio may play the villain on Marvel’s “Daredevil: Born Again,” but in real life, he’s doing hero’s work for fans of the show. This week, observers pick
